document.full_text: the united states has made headway fighting a deadly e.coli, but a lethal outbreak in germany and a lack of progress against salmonella show how much remains to be done to keep food safe, health officials said on tuesday.
document.title: major e.coli outbreaks decline, salmonella up
lines_and_colors: the united states has made headway fighting a deadly e.coli, but a lethal outbreak in germany and a lack of progress against salmonella show how much remains to be done to keep food safe, health officials said on tuesday.
